transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Yes.
Executive: Hello bhaiya good afternoon kya meri baat Pratham Mukherjee se ho rahi hai? Parth sorry.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji Parth main Tripti baat kar rahi hu aapke account manager IndiaMART ki side se aapki company run kar rahi hai Bulk Solids Innovation India Private Limited IndiaMART par. Isi ke regarding call thi mujhe aapse kuch details janni thi to abhi ye right time hoga aapse baat karne ka kyuki hard three minutes lagenge. Thik hai?
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Thik hai sir main janna chah rahi thi aapne kuch products hai aapke catalog mein jo aapne not relevant mark kiye hue hain. Main aapko product name bata deti hu water tap leakage testing machine. To sir kya aap isme kya issue aa raha tha jo aapne not relevant mark kiya hai inko main jaan sakti hu?
Customer: Actually ye hamara category mein nahi hai sir jo isko jis category mein hum product sell karte hain is category mein ye product nahi hai.
Executive: Achcha matlab in is category mein aap product mein deal nahi karte hain right?
Customer: Yes yes.
Executive: Thik hai to main aap abhi naam le rahi hu aap mujhe confirm karega ek to meters and coco peat right and water ya and digital pocket TDS meter right in sab mein aap deal nahi kar rahe hain.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi.
Executive: Thik hai to sir aap ek kaam kariye kyuki aapke catalog mein abhi ye product add hai main aapko suggest karu to aap abhi free hai to aap video meeting pe connect kar lijiye ya fir main aapko on call bata deti hu jaisa aapko thik lage aap mujhe bataye. Kyuki sir aapke catalog mein wo fir aapke pass by leads aayenge isse related.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Aapko jyada kuch nahi karna hai sir aap seller panel open kariye apna.
Customer: Seller panel ek minute.
Customer: Haan open kar liya.
Executive: Haan sir waha par aap setting mein jayiyega.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm setting mein aapko four option dikh rahe honge by lead preference.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan fourth option par aap tab par click kariye by lead preference mein.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: And usme aayega ek category preference.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Scroll down karega aapko mil jayega category preference down pe haan and sir waha par aapko ek wo milega tab milega not preference category ka right?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To sir waha par aap apni add mein jaakar jo jo category aapko nahi chahiye jaise aapne yaha par che category mein not relevant mark kiya hua hai ye sari waha par sir add kar dijiye.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: To fir aapko iski by leads nahi aayenge sir fir aapka catalog pe ye dikhega bhi nahi. Okay? Hmm hmm agar aap kar pa rahe hai to sir batayiyega warna agar video agar aap possible hai to main video meeting pe aake aap se kara deti hu isme changes.
Customer: Hmm thik hai aap ek baar link send dijiye.
Executive: Video main link bhej du aapko video link? Haan bhej dijiye.
Customer: Thik hai okay sir abhi free hai aap?
Customer: Haan haan free hai.
Executive: Okay okay thik hai sir okay main aapko mail bhejti hu abhi aap connect kar lijiye thik hai.
Customer: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to remove not relevant products from catalog.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the process to remove products.

- Agreed to send a video link for assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a video link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, byleads, not relevant, video link
